message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000. This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't agree to $13000. I would like to propose $10000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $11500 to make this work. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal.
